messages.safariWarning:
Safari detected. 
Due to browser API limitations, some peer-to-peer features (like local video sharing and screen capture) may not work correctly, even in the latest Safari version. 
To get the full functionality, please use a Chromium or Firefox-based browser.
messages.cameraError: Failed to access camera or microphone. Please check your browser permissions or ensure the site is accessed via HTTPS.
messages.firefoxWarning: Firefox detected. Due to browser limitations, you cannot share system audio while screen sharing. To share audio, please switch to a Chromium-based browser.
messages.mobileOSWarning: Mobile device detected. Due to operating system and mobile browser limitations, screen sharing is not available on mobile platforms. To initiate screen sharing, please use a desktop browser.
